short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: For the SCP wiki(s). Shows the rating of SCP objects in their listings (SCP Series, SCP Series 2, etc).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension shows the ratings of SCPs in the mainlist pages, as well as doing some other things. It is designed to integrate well with the website and not break immersion. Works on Chrome and Firefox!
